name: fladder
tagline: A self-hosted file sharing service for quick browser-based transfers
description: Fladder is a self-hosted file-sharing platform for sending files quickly and securely via the browser. It supports drag-and-drop uploads and download links with expiration, designed for quick file transfer workflows.

features.title: Media Client Interface
features.description: Browse and play media from a Jellyfin server

features.title: Library Browsing
features.description: Explore movies, series, and episodes in a structured view

features.title: Playback Controls
features.description: Control media playback from the client interface

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Use Jellyfin user accounts for personalized access

features.title: Watch Progress Tracking
features.description: Sync watched status and playback progress

features.title: Cross-Platform Support
features.description: Run the client on desktop and mobile platforms
